Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' leading to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' leading to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' that are followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Request Payment' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in relation to total declarations submitted
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' by each 'org:resource'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Total 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' performed by each 'org:resource'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities grouped by the last value of org:resource

Name: Average number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' that lead to a payment being requested and paid
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' that result in 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in cases where the budget owner and supervisor are the same person
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in domestic declarations compared to international travel claims
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' over 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in successful claims (not rejected at any stage)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not occur

Name: Percentage decrease in 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' when preceded by 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: the average of the function base < 0 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in relation to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in claims requiring director approval
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' per month
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities
